name: /// Ivy Sirena // Perfect Timing ///
description:
Welcome to Ivy Sirena's first ever blockchain-exclusive music release. This single, entitled "Perfect Timing", will only ever be available through this NFT.

Contents:

-Perfect Timing 24bit .WAV - 3:25
-Perfect Timing Album Art 768x768 pixels .gif


Lyrics:

[instrumental]

Even if I took a minute, 
I'd still be buried in it. 
You promised no surprises; 
you promised perfect timing. 
This place of desolation, 
the minds of evil hatred. 
I said I need a minute 
to consider you forgiven. 

Even if I took a minute, 
I'd still be stuck inside it. 
You know I hate surprises; 
you know I hate your timing. 
You want me to forgive you. 
I swear I'm falling into- 
I said I need a minute- 
I might need much more than minutes.


© 2021 Ivy Sirena
